title: Spring lamb hotpot
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 large carrots, chopped', '1kg diced spring lamb', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '750ml lamb stock', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 large potatoes, sliced thinly']
